EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Grocery.Send Email 5 - Post Webinar: Did not attend.IHL Post-Webinar Em
EmailTemplate.subject: Missed the Grocery Experience (Gx) Webinar? Here’s the Replay
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The world of grocery has changed, and some of those changes are likely permanent. According to IHL, 30-40% of these new journeys customers are experiencing in a COVID world will stick.
Are you ready to adapt?
Watch the webinar replay <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/food-drug-mass-merchandise/ihl-webinar?utm_source=outbound_email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=decodinggrocery&utm_content=email5&utm_industry=retail]]> to take a deep dive into the trends and data from IHL. You’ll also hear from two leading grocery retailers – Bashas’ & Northgate Market – on how they’re meeting new demands and exceeding their shoppers’ expectations. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
